title: Ticket #5963: param self-ref with default broken
description:
Configuration variables that self-reference and also use the :default syntax doesn't work - they aren't detected as self-references and thus case infinite recursion when they are expanded. Some of the policy metaknobs were using this feature 

   PREEMPT = $(PREEMPT:FALSE) || $(CPUS_EXCEEDED)
